ruby -e " print '<html><head><meta http-equiv=\"Refresh\" content=\"0; URL=' print 'http://jigsaw.w3.org/css-validator/validator?&warning=1&profile=none&usermedium=all&text='
\$<.each_byte do |b| if b == 32 print '+' elsif (48..57).include? b or (65..90).include? b or (97..122).include? b print b.chr else printf '%%%02x', b end end
puts '#errors\"></head><body></body></html>' "
